distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for slurm to version 18.08.8 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-12838: Fixed a SQL injection in slurmdbd (bsc#1140709).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: SchedMD Slurm 17.11.x, 18.08.0 through 18.08.7, and 19.05.0 allows SQL Injection.
notes.title: CVE description
